org.qteam.tinyicon.structs

Class IconDirEntry

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.qteam.tinyicon.structs.IconDirEntry

  • public final class IconDirEntry
extends java.lang.Object
    The equivalent class of Microsoft's ICONDIRENTRY structure.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int bitCount
      Ofs 6 (UINT16) - Bits per pixel.
      int bytesInRes
      Ofs 8 (UINT32) - How many bytes in this resource?
      int colorCount
      Ofs 2 (UINT8) - Number of colors in image (0 if >= 8 bpp).
      int height
      Ofs 1 (UINT8) - Height, in pixels, of the image (0 if >= 256 pixels).
      IconImage iconimage
      It's null if the image is a PNG, otherwise it contains the bitmap image info.
      int imageOffset
      Ofs 12 (UINT32) - Where in the file is this image?
      int planes
      Ofs 4 (UINT16) - Color Planes (Unused, should be 1).
      int reserved
      Ofs 3 (UINT8) - Reserved (Must be 0).
      int width
      Ofs 0 (UINT8) - Width, in pixels, of the image (0 if >= 256 pixels).

      Constructs a new IconDirEntry.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IconDirEntry

        protected IconDirEntry(java.lang.String icon_name,
                       byte[] buf,
                       int ofs)
                throws InvalidIconDataException
        Constructs a new IconDirEntry.
        Parameters:
        icon_name - The name of the icon.
        buf - The buffer that contains the icon data.
        ofs - The offset in the buffer where this IconDirEntry starts.
        Throws:
        InvalidIconDataException - if the icon has wrong data inside (e.g. invalid image header).

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string summarizing the state of this IconDirEntry.
        Note that the IconImage's toString method is called to print the image info.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a summary string.
